entry.title: Polar Pak - 5" Extra Deep Dome Hinged Clear Pie/Cake Slice Container - 300/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Polar Pak
Type: Disposables
Price: 113.99

 

Polar Pak - 503230 - 5" High Dome Hinged Clear OPS Plastic Pie / Cake Slice Container

Showcase every layer of your bakery, restaurant, or grocery store's cakes and pies with this Polar Pak 503230 5" clear plastic hinged container. This container's high dome lid is great for slices of mile-high pies, meringue pies with a heavy layer of whipped toppings, and layer cakes. Use this container's crystal clear lid to set up eye-catching displays. Then use its efficient design to enable your bakery or grocery store's customers to select containers and carry them home with ease.

Made of durable polyethylene (PETE) plastic with wide ribbing along the sides for added strength, this plastic protects your baked goods. It's resistant to water and oxygen, and does not transmit exterior odors to food products. Plus, this container's durability enables you to stack containers for compact presentation and transportation. Meanwhile, this triangular container's rounded corners prevent your crusts from crumbling after slightly bumping into the edge.

This container's hinged lid and one round lock tab ensures the lid remains securely sealed, but also opens effortlessly. The open tab is located on the front tip of the container, incorporating it into the triangular design. No need to transfer your baked goods to another container, this packaging makes an excellent plate as patrons can eat directly from the container.

Overall Dimensions:
Length: 5 3/8"
Maximum Width: 4 3/8"
Minimum Width: 1 3/4"
Base Height: 2 1/10"
Lid Height: 2 1/10"
Total Height: 4 3/16"

entry.title: Polar Pak - 9" Hinged Plastic Shallow Pie Clamshell Container - 200/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Polar Pak
Type: Disposables
Price: 149.99

Polar Pak - 03225 - 9" Hinged OPS Plastic Shallow Pie Clamshell Container - 200/case

Display your decadent desserts with optimum visibility with this Polar Pak 3225 9" hinged shallow pie container! This plastic pie container is great for storing and transporting your signature shallow pies. Use this container's crystal clear lid to set up eye-catching displays. Then use its efficient design to enable your bakery or grocery store's customers to select containers and carry them home with ease.

Made of durable oriented polystyrene (OPS) with wide ribbing along the sides for added strength, this plastic protects your pies. It's resistant to water and oxygen, and does not transmit exterior odors to food products. You can purchase with confidence knowing that this product is safe since it's made of FDA approved material. Plus, this container's durability enables you to stack containers for compact presentation and transportation. A concentric ribbed design on the container's base provides optimum stability and a sturdy foundation.

This container's hinged lid and two round lock tabs ensures the lid remains securely sealed, but also opens effortlessly. No need to transfer pies to another container, this packaging is perfect for your customer's to display at picnics, parties, and other events.

Overall Dimensions:
Diameter: 9 1/4"
Height: 2 5/8"
Interior Height: 2 1/2"

entry.title: Placon - CS64 - Crystal Seal 64 Oz Clear Hinged Container - 200/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Placon
Type: Disposables
Price: 124.99

Placon - CS64 - Crystal Seal 64 Oz Clear Hinged Container - 200/Case

Placon CS48 is made from PET uses 75% or more of our EcoStar® post-consumer recycled PET material, known for increased clarity and is 100% recyclable.

• Increased hinge strength and tight seals to ensure a secure closed fit

When customers can't get enough of your homemade chicken noodle soup, stews, pasta, and baked beans, let them take it home in this clear deli container! Great for delis, salad bars, or restaurant take-out applications, this container is designed for transporting, storing, and then reheating hot food items. Your customers will appreciate being served a sturdy container that won't leak and will keep their leftovers or deli purchases secure during the ride home. When paired with a compatible flush fit or recessed fit lid (sold separately), this container is leak and spill-proof. The classic round shape holds up to 48 oz. of your most popular hot and cold foods.

Clear For Product Visibility:Once food touches the container, it becomes nearly transparent, making it perfect for showcasing the bright colors of your signature hot items and sauces to make them more appealing to customers.

entry.title: MC - 32 Oz Clear Hinged Lid Container - 200/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: MC
Type: Disposables
Price: 61.99

Lock in freshness with the Clear Seal hinged lid plastic container

Give your customers the ultimate experience by letting them take home salads, sandwiches, cookies, and pasta with this clear hinged container! Comprised of PET plastic, this container is perfect for delis, concession stands, food trucks, cafes, and any food service establishment that offers take-out.

Crystal Clear

The crystal clear design provides optimal product visibility, making your food instantly identifiable. It also expertly showcases the vibrant colors of small salads, snacks, or desserts.

Hinged Design

The hinged design ensures the base and lid remain attached while providing a tight seal to lock in your food's flavor and freshness. Plus, the hinged design cuts down product inventory and saves storage space with its nestable design.

Secure Closure

Bar-locks provide a snap-tight secure closure while easily accessible gripper tabs simplify opening.

Leak Resistant

Being a Crystal Seal product, this container features a perimeter seal designed to maximize product freshness and reduce leaks.

Label Window

The label window provides an ideal location for a label or tamper evident seal.
